summary: Bachelor’s degree in industrial engineering with experience in quality management systems; project formulation, budgeting, implementation and evaluation; contract and procurements; analysis of information and reports; and development of administrative and financial activities, across health, finance, oil & gas, retail and IT industry sectors and international organizations.

volunteer_experiences:
[{'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'role': 'Volunteer staff position', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'Casa Migrante', 'logo': None, 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/casa-migrante/'}, 'cause': 'SOCIAL_SERVICES', 'description': '•	Providing the orientation and help to the Spanish-speaking immigrant in the first steps in their integration into society, providing basic assistance or refer them to other services (Social Assistance, Psychological Care, Legal Advice, Sworn Translations and Interpreters, Pastoral Support, etc.).
•	Collaborates in contacting the different Dutch institutions, helping to complete forms, performing oral translations of documents and letters.
•	Updating the data in the database of Casa Migrante.
•	Supporting the updating of the Casa Migrate website.
•	Collecting data for the project of monitoring and evaluation services in Casa Migrante.
•	Create distributable material whit information in Spanish that helps to understand the different process in the Netherlands (how to open a bank account, what to do in case of work exploitation, etc.)
•	Assisting victims/clients in a labour-related situation and/or in a possible situation of human trafficking.'}, {'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2023}}, 'role': 'Cultural Mediator ', 'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'FairWork', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFzhvnm6fkoQw/company-logo_400_400/0/1519898313485?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=8zxw-Ve9C1m-dBwY-XhR0GbxqcePlDScKwdB2Rxe2fg', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/fairwork/'}, 'cause': 'CIVIL_RIGHTS', 'description': '•	Outreach work as well online as offline and build a relevant network in the Spanish speaking community in the Netherlands. Inform Spanish speaking migrant workers in The Netherlands focused on raising awareness on Labour rights and Labour Exploitation.
•	Client Support: Give support to Spanish speaking migrant workers through email, phone or Messenger or other social media and face to face meetings.
•	Administration of the data of clients in the Database of Fairwork.
•	Be the link whit other organizations - Casa Migrante.
•	Supporting the implementation and monitoring of the project for undocumented people.
•	Assisting victims/clients in a labour-related situation and/or in a possible situation of human trafficking.'}]
